description:
Keisuke was once a famous football player. He refused to play in GPX pornographic movie which resulted in his girlfriend Natsuko death and his framing into it along with drugs smuggling. Due to all those events his hair turned white which later earned him White Haired Demon nickname. Keisuke sworn himself, that he will destroy GPX to avenge Natsuko. Vengeance become his first priority.
After he left prison he went to Brazil and under name Baraki Rio looked for gold to help in his revenge. There he met Kusaka Yuko. And that is the beginning of the story...
name: Ibaraki Keisuke
